title: Dave Matthews Band Live - 8/20/2008 (FLAC) - RIP Leroi Moore
description:
Dave Matthews Band
August 20, 2008
Staples Center - Los Angeles, CA

Taper: Jon Koch
Source: Schoeps MK4 > active cables > Nbox+ > IRiver iHP-120 (Rockbox)
Location: Mics DIN ~14', RFC in corner of soundbooth
Transfer: IRiver iHP-120 > USB > PC
Edit: wav > Sony Soundforge 7.0b > wav > CD Wave > wav
Conversion: wav > FLAC frontend 1.7.1 > .flac

---PRESERVE THE QUALITY, PLEASE DO NOT ENCODE INTO MP3 OTHER THAN FOR PERSONAL USE---

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Notes: This recording is dedicated to the memory of LeRoi Moore.
Rest in peace, Roi. We all love and will miss you.

Thank you to the Dave Matthews Band, the road crew, and everyone associated with these shows. Your courage and perseverance do not go unnoticed.

A fund has been created in honor of LeRoi Moore in support of charities that reflect both his spirit and passion.  Donations via check referencing  the "Charlottesville Area Community Foundation for the LeRoi Moore Memorial Fund" may be mailed to:

Charlottesville Area Community Foundation
PO Box 1767
Charlottesville, VA 22902

Donations may also be made online. Visit www.dmband.com for more details.
